duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate delivery of health care to assist in diagnosis and treatment.
Direct human and physical resources to achieve an established standard of care in radiologic sciences.
Supervise technical services of an assigned area for maintenance of prescribed standards.
Ensure technical adequacy of studies by evaluating accuracy of images, directing retakes, and demonstrating proper operation of equipment.
Foster collaboration and guide the efforts of the team.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Maintain knowledge of current trends and techniques in the field to enhance expertise.

education_certification.credential: Current NYS license as a registered radiologic technologist.
American Registry of Radiologic Technologist (ARRT) certification.
